alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 11:40AM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially tonight through Saturday morning. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
